title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node.js and modern browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama. Install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any Ollama model as an LLM or embedding provider inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI). ChatGPT-style interface with plugins, RAG, voice.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Simple fluent API to chat, generate, and manage models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama. Idiomatic Ruby wrapper with ActiveModel-style interfaces.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama written in Rust. Syntax highlighting, history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement. Inline suggestions & chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from Ollama. Useful starter template.

title: ollama-ts
summary: Community TypeScript definitions and utilities for Ollama REST API beyond the official JS client.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image source and compose examples for CPU & GPU setups.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma. Shows ingestion and question-answering.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that chats through Ollama. Slash commands, thread support, and model switching.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama. Install and pin exact versions declaratively.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama. Chat and generate text from mobile or desktop Flutter apps.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir NIF binding for Ollama. Fast concurrent calls with GenServer wrappers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with integration for ASP.NET Core and minimal APIs.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama. Lightweight and cross-platform with build.zig integration.
